website_summaries.verdict: Battery-powered electric sharpener is easy to take with you on the go and gets your pencils into a nice point quickly.
pros: Nice size without the hassles of a cord
Includes an auto-safety stop, which keeps it from working if the cover is off for emptying
Does not chew up colored pencils and watercolor pencils
cons: If a pencil lead gets jammed in this sharpener, you may find it very hard to fix

customer_reviews.title: Don't Bother
customer_reviews.text: I bought this so that I would have a pencil sharpener in the living room and in my bedroom so I could sharpen my colored pencils when I wanted to color in my coloring books no matter what room I was in the sharpener I have in the living room works great this one however sucks. I put in a pencil and it growls like it's trying to do something but it never sharpens anything it just makes noise I've tried putting in a regular pencil and it doesn't sharpen it either so I have no idea what it's problem is I wouldn't waste my mone.
customer_reviews.author: burplepatti

customer_reviews.title: Did not sharpen many pencils before it died.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in August of 2017, it quit working in June 2018. To give you an idea of how many pencils I sharpened, I only emptied the shavings compartment once. It is a small compartment. I only use wooden pencils in my woodworking shop when I have a project to work on. So infrequent useage. I am very unhappy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry G.

customer_reviews.title: Great sharpener. Small, Powerful. Well made. Nice Color.
customer_reviews.text: Great and handy sharpener. It is seriously hi-torque and works great, replacing a somewhat similar product I had used for years that was never as powerful as this bad boy. Granted, most of us are not pencil-sharpener-centric these days, but when you do want a sharp pencil, this is it. It uses twice the amount AA batteries (4 of them and they'll last forever, so no biggee) to power a seriously robust motor. It's a great pleasure sharpening pencils these days. Highly recommended. Arrived quickly. I just bought a second one for a second location.
customer_reviews.author: Wigglesworth

customer_reviews.title: Won't sharpen after less than two months.
customer_reviews.text: With two school age children, we need to use a sharpener almost every day. If you are in a similar situation, this is not the sharpener for you. After less than two months of use it will no longer sharpen pencils. I took it apart and cleaned out all the shavings, to no avail. The internal gears are plastic and have already worn down. If there is any resistance at all when trying to spin the sharpener, the gears instead skip or simply jam up.
customer_reviews.author: I. M. Chartoff

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my classroom and wasn't disappointed with how well it worked. I have used it for the entire school year and it was used multiple times a day. It sharpens well, works quick and performs far better than it's asking price.
customer_reviews.author: Andria O'Hara

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after two and a half months.
customer_reviews.text: This sharpener worked beautifully for two and a half months. Then it stopped working. At first I thought it was a battery problem. But it isn't. I don't recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Kim

customer_reviews.title: TERRIFIC!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this sharpener. I have tried SEVERAL sharpners and this is the ONLY one I've found that actually works on coloring pens. It's wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Janice L. Jones

customer_reviews.title: It is a compact and powerful pencil sharpener - No ...
customer_reviews.text: It is a compact and powerful pencil sharpener - No need to plug in, which is a plus making the item movable in your desk, work area or even for the road.
customer_reviews.author: Irma Santiago

customer_reviews.title: This is great for a child
customer_reviews.text: This is great for a child. I bought this for my 7 year old grandson to use with his colored pencils. It's always handy and easy for him to use.
customer_reviews.author: Bearlyscorpio

customer_reviews.title: Just won't work smoothly
customer_reviews.text: So I don't understand why so many people love this. Mine was not working smoothly. I tried two separate set of new batteries and we couldn't get it to move smoothly, meaning it get stuck and won't move or sharpen. Takes me forever . However, when I do get it to move, it is sharp. Very sharp. But the trick is get it to move. Took me forever to get a few done and the worst is the sharpener turns hot, like over heat. I don't think the batteries are the issues, they are new. So I have to return this. I could have gotten a lemon?
customer_reviews.author: Bee Kim Baskett

customer_reviews.title: Lots of power in a little sharpener
customer_reviews.text: I have been searching for a pencil sharpener for some time. I've tried them all, hand crank, electric, etc. I had been putting off a battery operated one, figuring it wouldn't have enough power to work well. However, this little thing really works!! Even my electric one wouldn't work well (would break tips, shave only one side making it uneven, etc) It is small & compact, which is great for my needs, though some may feel the shaving cup fills up too quickly. It sharpens quickly & evenly, leaving a nice tip. Time will only tell how well it holds up, but so far I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Laura E.

customer_reviews.title: Great but doesn’t work continually! Too late to return
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this thing except for that it keeps quitting. When it works, it works great. But the problem is it only worked about a week and a half, then stopped. I cleaned out the battery compartment and put brand new batteries in, and it worked about another week then quit. Super disappointed cause it works well except that it doesn’t work! And of course I can’t return it now because it worked long enough to pass the return window. That’s not so great, Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Dayna

customer_reviews.title: eater of pencils
customer_reviews.text: It was fine for the first few months, but now it often chews up the end of pencils (not just soft ones either). and its virtually impossible to clear the broken lead out. There is no way to access it. So it stops you from putting the (now broken) pencil back in to resharpen it, because the old lead is stuck in there
customer_reviews.author: Bolan

customer_reviews.title: 10/10 IMO
customer_reviews.text: This little sharpener does a great job sharpening pencils, but I have been impressed with its durability. I bought it mainly for my kids to use and I cannot tell you how many times it has been dropped and still works as great as ever. This little sharpener even took a bad fall down a flight of stairs and I thought that would be the end of it, but no, it keeps on going great. The reservoir for the pencil shavings is a little small, but that would be my only critique.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney W.

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: Showing no signs of damage during shipping, and with brand new batteries correctly installed, this pencil sharpener did not work at all, showing zero signs of life. If they send me a working replacement I might revise my review. But for 18 bucks this thing should have at least sharpened a few pencils before it quit. Doesn't anybody test products at Amazon before they ship? Just junk.
customer_reviews.author: D.Baechler

customer_reviews.title: Great little powerhouse and money saver!
customer_reviews.text: Great little powerhouse for a sharpener that is easy to take anywhere. Bought it for my wife and she loves it. She does a great deal of coloring with those new style coloring pencils. They cost too much to allow our older electric sharpener (more than 15 years old) to just chew up. That is exactly what happened before we found this little gem. She can take it to the hospital and rehab center easily when she has to be at such places. It weighs much less than our old relic for her to handle and no need for an electric outlet. Would recommend it to anyone. Will buy it again should the need arise.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Wayne Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Nice little pencil sharpener
customer_reviews.text: We received this pencil sharpener about 2-3 weeks ago and have been using it on and off while completely school work in the evenings. We've had no issues with it and it sharpens the pencils to a nice point each time. Nice small, light-weight, and easy to use electric pencil sharpener. I also like that the opening that the pencil goes into has a cover over it that moves out of the way as you push the pencil through. A little safety reassurance in the house when you have a curious 4 year old is a good thing.
customer_reviews.author: Jpghtwin

customer_reviews.title: Amazon states this sharpener was good for both regular and colored pencils
customer_reviews.text: Amazon states this sharpener was good for both regular and colored pencils. I specifically bought it for my colored pencils. However, when reading through the insert that tells how to put batteries in, there was a paragraph labeled "attention" not for use with colored pencils. I was dismayed. I used it for the pencils anyway and they turned out great!!! It's a great sharpener but I will only give it 4 stars due to descrepancy between amazons description and the manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Cathie Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Ordering again! First one lasted a long time!
customer_reviews.text: I am a person who doesn’t usually take much time to write reviews but just realized that this pencil sharpener has outlived ALL others that I’ve ever purchased! It survived just over two years in my house and that’s saying a lot as we now have 8 children and homeschool! This sharpener just bit the dust today and since we liked it so well I decided I’d better buy another. After I saw that it lasted over 2 years I think I’ll be ordering 2 of them! 😂
customer_reviews.author: Emily L

customer_reviews.title: Wasted my time and money
customer_reviews.text: Wasted my time and money..I tried 4 different pencil and it will just not work..it stops and when u take the pencil out ,u will see little point coming out on one side and the wood is covering most of the pencil and you cannot write..my son was excited to see the sharpner and now he is really mad :( ...I am not sure how a product has this many positive reviews and it just doesn't work..
customer_reviews.author: AT

customer_reviews.title: It's not particularly easy for kids to use because if they stick the ...
customer_reviews.text: This pencil sharpener is okay. It works fairly well and sharpens most pencils quickly. It's not particularly easy for kids to use because if they stick the pencil in too far, the sharpener simply stops. So, it's tricky to find the right spot to stick it in and not leave it in too long because the pencil sharpener will keep on sharpening until the pencil is gone. I have also found that some pencils do not work in this pencil sharpener. I'm not sure what kind of pencil it is that didn't work.
customer_reviews.author: Chandra

customer_reviews.title: This does not seem to work. You have to ...
customer_reviews.text: This does not seem to work. You have to hold the pencil down and turn it to make it sharpen but then the sharpener stops. It doesn't seem to be the battery.
customer_reviews.author: nvb

customer_reviews.title: I love this pencil sharpener
customer_reviews.text: I love this pencil sharpener. It works great sharpening the pencil tips without leaving frays. It's just the right size for where I want to keep it for everyone in the house to use. I can highly recommend it if you need a handy sharpener and don't need all different tip sizes. This is great for regular pencils. I like the way I don't have to worry about a cord so I can take it wherever I want.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie S. Adams

customer_reviews.title: Great little sharpener
customer_reviews.text: This small footprint pencil sharpener is a gem. No cords, so it takes up almost no space on a counter or desk. It’s quite attractive. AND, most importantly, it does a great job of sharpening pencils, which after all is the reason you would buy it. I’ve only had it a month or so, and therefore I cannot comment on durability or battery life. But it seems very well made.
customer_reviews.author: J. Scott Rutan

customer_reviews.title: Great for all your pointy pencil needs!
customer_reviews.text: I love this pencil sharpener! I use Prismacolor soft-core pencils and this sharpener gets them sharp and pointy in just a few seconds. I have also used it to sharpen my Black Widow colored pencils and it does great with those as well so it It accommodates many pencil shapes. The only (small) issue is that it is pretty loud, but I would still buy it again. 🙂
customer_reviews.author: GoJessGo

customer_reviews.title: This is a nice small electric pencil sharpener
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice small electric pencil sharpener. It helps me quickly sharpen my son's colored pencils, which he loves drawing with. It does a good job on the crayola brand, I've had a few breaks, but I'm not sure if it's just the lead in the pencil. My one complaint would be how difficult it is to open the shavings container for emptying. It takes a bit of muscle which causes some of the shavings to pop out onto me instead of an easy dump into the trash can. Overall a good purchase for this drawling/color loving household. :)
customer_reviews.author: Jen627

customer_reviews.title: Ordering more!!
customer_reviews.text: How can such a small sharpener do such an amazing job?!?! I worked in schools for years and saw about every make and model of sharpener out there. This little battery-powered guy out performs all of them. It even handles colored pencils which many brands do not. It has a compact, eye-pleasing design that takes up hardly any room on my desk. In addition, it sharpens very quickly to a precision point, and it opens easily to empty the shavings. Best little discovery I've made all year! : )
customer_reviews.author: Mariner

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected
customer_reviews.text: Great sharpener. Works as expected. You should be careful while inserting the pencil ( only insert halfway)should follow the instruction paper clearly. And it needs 4 batteries. Update: I used fresh alkaline batteries from amazon and it works like a magic. It stop sharping when the tip is sharp. So in love with this mess free sharpener.
customer_reviews.author: Natchatra Sen

customer_reviews.title: Powerful Sharpener
customer_reviews.text: Great sharpener, I love that its so small that I can leave it in my desk and take out quickly when I need to use it. It is powerful and quick. I am so happy I purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: L. Liang

customer_reviews.title: Put Pencils In Absolutely STRAIGHT!
customer_reviews.text: This pencil sharpener works GREAT for the soft pencils used by most "adult" coloring book pictures. It fills up fast, but empties just as quickly and easily. Thought it was a bit funny to mention "electric" when it really IS "battery operated" but oh well... :) Does the job exceptionally well...at least for me. Tried manual (twisting) sharpeners, but they chewed up the pencils--NOT what was wanted!
customer_reviews.author: Sally Lycke

customer_reviews.title: Noisy and slow. Sorry i bought this.
customer_reviews.text: Using this sharpener is a real struggle. It is very noisy. The machine turns itself off and the pencil gets stuck inside if you push it too far down. You have to be very careful to hold it 'just so' the entire time based on the sound of it grinding. You will error and it will get stuck at least 3 times during a sharpening. I timed how long it took me to sharpen 10 dull pencils. It takes between 1 1/2 to 3 minutes to sharpen one. On 4 of them, i was left with wood on one side, to the point.
customer_reviews.author: Rasa

customer_reviews.title: Robust little sharpener
customer_reviews.text: Well constructed sharpener with a good sized shavings container that stays firmly in place. The device generates a nice sharp and centered point and is relatively quiet as sharpeners go. Unlike some others, I had no issues with battery orientation and found loading the unit with AA's quite straightforward.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Great sharpener—already broken ):
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely loved this product. It sharpened pencils very quickly. Many of my teacher colleagues asked where I got it. The only downside is that it run out of batterie quickly, but that also may be a product of the amount of pencils that my students are constantly sharpening. That being said, it's worth it for the quality of the sharpener, and very doable if you can get some rechargeable batteries. I'm giving this a two-start review, because the pencil sharpener stopped working after almost four months.
customer_reviews.author: Ana

customer_reviews.title: Great little sharpener for colored pencils.
customer_reviews.text: I am a colored pencil portrait artist and sharpen my pencils constantly, as a sharp point is necessary to get into the tooth of the paper. I previously used a sharpener that is now discontinued. I have only had this sharpener for a couple of weeks, but am very impressed with it. I like the weight, the consistency, and the top opening. I wish it had auto stop however.
customer_reviews.author: Betty

customer_reviews.title: Can't go wrong with this!
customer_reviews.text: My previous battery operated pencil sharpener finally died after many years, so this item has been a great replacement so far. One thing my previous sharpener wasn't able to do was handle those fancy coloring pencils that are sold at places like Aaron Brothers. But this sharpener handles those with ease, much to the delight of the other household member who loves those adult coloring books. As for me, my needs are much simpler (ha!), but for the price, this item provides great value and doesn't take up a lot of room on my desk -- it fits very nicely in an open compartment on my desk.
customer_reviews.author: Todd D. Fisher

customer_reviews.title: I want to apologize for cheating
customer_reviews.text: I bought this 18 months ago for my colored pencils, which are insanely expensive, so I require therapy, wine (or both) when a point breaks. This little thing goes everywhere with me and still works as well as the day I opened the box. I had a brief fling with the Swordfish, which is a highly-rated manual sharpener that many artists recommend. It does make a nice point, but my little Tripworthy does that and does it faster. I'm so sorry, Trippy. I'll never cheat on you again.
customer_reviews.author: Roxanne Janners

customer_reviews.title: Eats your pencils..
customer_reviews.text: Had this sharpener for a few years, it never was the greatest. Recently , we started using it a lot more. It would just eat through a pencil without ever providing a good point. I though it was just cheap pencils. After buying a box of Ticonderoga’s and comparing this to a 20+ old hand crank sharpener i can say..this is a disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: AlanPacBch

customer_reviews.title: Must have for school aged kids and artists.
customer_reviews.text: The absolute best little sharpener. I have a 9 year old artist and this works great for her specialty colored pencils as well as the standard #2 pencils for school. I love how even my little Kindergartener is able to use this completely independently. This is a must have for households with school aged kids. I plan of gifting them to the kids teachers this year also, because they are so compact and quiet.
customer_reviews.author: C. Jack

customer_reviews.title: great little pencil sharpener
customer_reviews.text: This thing is pretty great. We have had it now for about 4 months and my kids use it multiple times a week. They have used it for regular pencils and colored pencils. Works great. but you do have to hold it steady and add a little pressure when using it, otherwise, you'll have it in there for a few seconds it sounds like it's working hard, but when you pull your pencil out, it hasn't done anything! So after a few tries, we finally figured out that we needed to push and hold it down. We really like it!
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Ward

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding value.
customer_reviews.text: I just wanted something cordless that I could drag around with my sketch pad but this little thing is a work-horse. I also bought a very large set of colored pencils and a set of water color pencils. Halfway through the regular colored pencils my old Boston pencil sharpener sharpened its last. This little gizmo sharpened the remaining close to 200 pencils with perfect points and never slowed down. Compact, light, easy to clean and lives up to its namesake. A small trapdoor closes over the cutter to prevent shavings from leaking all over.
customer_reviews.author: AbleTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: This is a great pencil sharpener!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great pencil sharpener! I bought this to put downstairs for my kids to use - upstairs, in the office, we have a much larger sharpener - the iPoint. For a battery operated sharpener, this one is much better than the iPoint. Easy to use for my 5-and-10-year-old, works fast and sharpens perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: urban09805

customer_reviews.title: Superb pencil sharpener
customer_reviews.text: This may be small but boy does it sharpen pencils. I have an electric pencil sharpener but needed on that I could have close at hand, so I thought I would try a small battery operated one. I must admit my expectations weren't to high but what a surprise. Sharpens so fast and leaves a really nice point on the pencil. Easy to clean, too.
customer_reviews.author: Vickie

customer_reviews.title: am happy with this sharpener.
customer_reviews.text: Got this so my daughter can sharpen her pencils to do her homework and to sharpen both of our colored pencils, at first I thought I would be returning it since the motor barely moved, but I used a different set of batteries and it now works fine, so I am guessing cheap batteries should be avoided with this one or maybe I had a bad batch but nonetheless I am happy with this sharpener.
customer_reviews.author: Janna

customer_reviews.title: Poorly Made Sharpener - Dissappointing
customer_reviews.text: Thought I was buying this sharpener for convenience but it ended up causing so much frustration. It’s battery operated - which is why I bought it - but the batteries burn out so quickly and the sharpener is ineffective. Not worth the time or money spent
customer_reviews.author: Kim4813

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: It does what I need it to do and that is sharpen pencils very well. You have to make sure you hold it when you use it, because there is not enough weight to it and it will start to spin if you don't hold it while sharpening a pencil. It does do a real nice job of sharpening though and that is what is most important. It is actually the best sharpener I have ever owned and the price is right.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn Weaver

customer_reviews.title: This is a great colored pencil sharpener
customer_reviews.text: This is a great colored pencil sharpener. It is quiet and compact. The one drawback is the shavings compartment is hard to open particularly for anyone with weak or arthritic hands. After a few tries I finally got it open but an exterior rather than interior release button would have really improved the overall design. It’s small enough to be portable.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie C.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: Perfect pencil sharpener. This pencil sharpener is exactly what we needed, a desk top version that ran on batteries. So far so good as it is sharpening pencils without breaking them. It is lightweight and simple to operate which is great for my kids. It is louder than the electric ones we have but it's size and portability make up for that.
customer_reviews.author: Scottsdale

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Colored Pencil Sharpener!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I use it exclusively for colored pencils in my classroom, and works amazingly. Never breaks the soft lead of the colored pencils. Also, always sharpens first try. Students love it and never spend forever trying to sharpen colored pencils anymore. Saves on the life of the pencils which saves me money. Well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Go for this Sharpener!
customer_reviews.text: Great Great. Best ever for Prisma Colored Pencils. Easy to empty and large receptacle for shavings. Quick to use, makes really sharp point or you can make less sharp if you want to. Really nice weight to it. Love the handy size. Great price for the product. Totally recommend. Delivered in like one day. Plan to buy another one for travel...or maybe they'll give me another one after this stellar review! LOL
customer_reviews.author: Ohs

customer_reviews.title: I find that the wax in colored pencils often clogs and breaks electric sharpeners so I don't like to use my expensive industrial
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my colored pencils: I find that the wax in colored pencils often clogs and breaks electric sharpeners so I don't like to use my expensive industrial pencil sharpener to sharpen them. But this tiny one is super fast, really convenient and while it's had no problems so far, it's cheap enough to not be so much a problem if it doesn't last the year! Really, really in love with it.
customer_reviews.author: Esther

customer_reviews.title: Compact and easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: Pro's: Small size, easy to use, convenient, easy to open and close shredded pencil pieces Con's: Doesn't sharpen pencils straight, they come out at an angle so the full lead isn't shown I've been using this product for a while now. It sharpens quickly, but often comes out with only half of the lead showing. It's a little inconvenient, but overall it is a great little sharpener.
customer_reviews.author: liz

customer_reviews.title: Great sharpener!
customer_reviews.text: This is a fine sharpener, makes a great point on the pencil and looks good on your desk. The only suggestion I would make would be to add a little rubber or something on the bottom so it does not slide away from you when you are using it. Overall I am very pleased with this sharpener!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas C. Meisel

customer_reviews.title: A good purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used it a whole lot yet, but it really does the job. Fairly quiet and sharpens nicely. A lot depends on the pressure you apply while sharpening. The shaved wood is easily seen through a hefty container on the front so you can empty when full. I really like it!
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Great company!
customer_reviews.text: Great pencil sharpener!! I've had so many that break the lead or you can only use one side of the pencil and who on earth has time for that? This works perfectly each time and while I'm surprised I bought a battery operated one I do love that I can grab it and go to the garage or wherever without worrying about a plug. Fast shipping too! Tripworthy rocks!
customer_reviews.author: Nuts4dogs

customer_reviews.title: Buying my Second Because I'm in LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: This sharpener is my ALL TIME favorite! I'm a teacher who wanted her own personal sharpener that students are NOT allowed to break ( I mean use). I keep this at my desk and it makes the greatest points on my pencils. It sharpens better than any other one I've had. I'm now buying a second one for home!
customer_reviews.author: Texas Momma

customer_reviews.title: Empty the ground wood container over a waste can! Take your time until you learn the technique.
customer_reviews.text: Produces a very sharp point quickly and is heavy enough that you do not need to hold the sharpener with your free hand. It takes practice and patience to remove and empty the ground wood without making a mess. Instructions would would be helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Travel Man

customer_reviews.title: Wouldnt recommend for expensive coloring pencils
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because it had such amazing feedback.. i was so disappointed when i used my cheap coloered pencils on it.. it sharpens them too much to get them sharp.. i wont be using my prismacolors on this.. it would ruin them
customer_reviews.author: Ssbbw

customer_reviews.title: Love it, buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Excited about this little portable pencil sharpener. Will slip into suitcase easily when traveling so I can still do coloring pages or dot to dot. No plug just batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Gail V Long

customer_reviews.title: Good product with mediocre quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought this pencil sharpener for my son. Really liked the design and portability. But after some moderate use, the gear mechanism (and possibly the motor) started to break down. I can hear the motor noise when I insert a pencil for sharpening, but the metal grinder would not spin. I opened the cover and saw the gear directly attached to the motor shifted and unable to make contact to the gear next to it. So I realign the gears. However, the realignment did not last for even five seconds. It is unfortunate that the reliability is not better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: not much power
customer_reviews.text: this doesn't have much power. I tried new batteries twice and that wasn't the problem. The motor sounds like it is really struggling and it takes twice as long as it should to sharpen a regular #2 pencil.
customer_reviews.author: Alaska

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sharpener! Old school (barber pole style) sharpening roller...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sharpener! Unlike some of the other ones on the market that use a razor blade (or 2) to sharpen, this one uses the old school (barber pole style) sharpening roller (or bit) for lack of the proper term. The kind found in the old metal can sharpeners commonly found in schools and under your grand parents stairs in the 60's-80's. They always worked, never needed fixing and could chew through a pencil in seconds just like this one. If you have youngsters, teach them to be gentle when sharping their pencils or you'll find yourself buying new ones rather quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Darryl

customer_reviews.title: Died after 6 months
customer_reviews.text: EDIT: supplier agreed to warranty, very cordial. We really like the product but one of ours died after 6 months. It runs, but appears to have stripped the internal gears. It runs internally but doesn't sharpen the pencil.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan M. Noonan

customer_reviews.title: Super convenient, super efficient, super sharp points
customer_reviews.text: Our old, corded pencil sharpener bit the dust and we needed a new one. So happy with this one. LOVE that it battery operated, no codes to deal with. I can just grab it and hand it to whichever child needs it. Works great, puts the sharpest point I've ever seen on our pencils. Not that super sharp points are needed, butt still impressive. Two thumbs up. 👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: MT

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little sharpener!
customer_reviews.text: This little pencil sharpener is awesome. It’s quick and makes the pencils super pointy. It’s a little bigger than I thought but it’s still small enough to put in a bag or purse and take with. Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: abcl

customer_reviews.title: I have a very nice pencil sharpener that works great on # 2 lead ...
customer_reviews.text: My wife does artwork and uses colored soft lead pencils. I have a very nice pencil sharpener that works great on # 2 lead pencils and eats up her pencils. This one is perfect for soft lead art pencils-works great
customer_reviews.author: Dusty

customer_reviews.title: Not for daily use
customer_reviews.text: A little lightweight so if you are looking for daily use, this is not it. I use it in our RV when we travel so for me it’s fine but I do not think it would hold up for heavy use. For me it works well.
customer_reviews.author: SusyErnie

customer_reviews.title: Battery Cover on Case Tricky
customer_reviews.text: Assembled (put in batteries to try it) to check it out for my grandkids -- did not work t first, util I took a very close look and saw that the battery cover was not quite closed. Once I got it snapped in place, it worked. SO... two observations... 1. The case is so shiny it is very hard to notice when the battery cover is not quite on correctly, so check closely if you have trouble. 2. The battery cover is not easy to fit onto the case -- do ti very very carefully.
customer_reviews.author: Online since68

customer_reviews.title: And this battery operated sharpener is simply the best. I should have bought this one long before
customer_reviews.text: I have bought a few pencil sharpeners before, and none of them really work as I expected. And this battery operated sharpener is simply the best. I should have bought this one long before, and would definitely buy again. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: liuhuisheng

customer_reviews.title: GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this pencil sharpener after giving up on trying to let my little one use the little manual ones for sharpening his pencils for his homework (and colored pencils for his art) and it was the best decision ever. This pencil sharpener is going stronger than ever after LOTS of use! It's also super easy to empty and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Halli Burchett

customer_reviews.title: Mmm...not so much!
customer_reviews.text: In spite of the many positive reviews about this sharpener, particular for colored pencils, it does not do a good job of sharpening colored pencils. Perhaps it is the grade of pencil used but disappointed as this is no better than a manual sharpener.
customer_reviews.author: Monti

customer_reviews.title: Greal portable sharpener for home use.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this sharpener after our other one broke. The other one had one of those small pencil sharpeners like we had in school driven by a small battery powered one. This one is much more heavy duty and turns a sharpener mechanism like you would find on a wall mount sharpener. I am very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: William R. Ingols

customer_reviews.title: Sharpens to a point!
customer_reviews.text: I love this sharpener which I use for pencils for my adult coloring projects. The fact that it sharpens to a fine point makes it easy to 'stay in the lines' on intricate patterns. It works better than any sharpener I have ever used. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: MK

customer_reviews.title: Good buy.
customer_reviews.text: Small & compact. It sharpens well and children seem to love the novelty of it. I guess sharpening a pencil manually has become hard work. *shrugs* A downside to some people might be that it uses batteries, but i use rechargeable so I don't have to purchase every time it dies. My only complaint is that it is very loud when in operation, so you will definitely know when its been used. Otherwise good buy so far.
customer_reviews.author: Marc

customer_reviews.title: Horrible item
customer_reviews.text: Sharpened six pencils and stopped working. Waited 45 minutes to attempt to sharpen again, still would not work. Changed batteries, still did not work. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Lilly

customer_reviews.title: Died after 2 years
customer_reviews.text: Sharpened nicely until it died after 2 years of light use
customer_reviews.author: des

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: WAs working perfect until a lead broke inside and it was impossible to remove the broken lead tip
customer_reviews.author: R Funk

customer_reviews.title: Strong sharpening action for battery operated small portable sharpener.
customer_reviews.text: Two hands are needed to use this small pencil sharpener, one for the pencil and one to stabilize the sharpener. The sharpening action is strong so watch your pressure when inserting the pencil. It will sharp and short very quickly. I am using this for prismacolor pencils and like the results.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Sharpener
customer_reviews.text: Amazing!!! I am a classroom teacher and have been searching for a pencil sharpener that eat my student's colored pencils. I saw this mentioned online and gave it a try. I was skeptical since it was battery operated (I am making sure I keep extra batteries at school), but it is amazing. The pencils sharpen perfectly. Mind you this is still new, so I hope it can last for a while!
customer_reviews.author: Tigger112172

customer_reviews.title: Love it! We use it in our classroom for ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it! We use it in our classroom for colored pencils- and we've hidden it from students because it works so well we don't want them to do anything bad to it! :-) It's super quiet, so quiet I wasn't even sure it was working, but nope, the colored pencils came out sharpened perfectly. It's a little smaller than I thought it would be, easily fits in the palm of your hand, but mighty and does a great job! We'll easily sharpen 20+ colored pencils a day (just regular school-type, Crayola, etc) and have zero problems. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Barbera

customer_reviews.title: Failed
customer_reviews.text: Sharper blades do not move once the pencil is inserted. Blades are clean, they just stopped gripping the pencil. I've had the sharper nearly three years, but have used it less than 40 times during that period. It's a bit late to ask for a refund or replacement, but there you have it.
customer_reviews.author: Jake Schor

customer_reviews.title: Plenty of power. Empty it regularly.
customer_reviews.text: I have always had plug in sharpeners, so this one gives me much more flexibility. We have 4 people that use it and I only have to change the batteries after 5 months or so. Once I did find that since I overfilled the cartridge with too many pencil shavings, it overflowed to the battery case and I had to clean that out. Seems solvable by emptying more regularly. Plenty of power to it.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Traeger

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Pencil sharpener works great. You will need to hold it when you put your pencil in or it will try to spin a bit due to it being small and a lighter weight but that is to be expected in my opinion. I would recommend this pencil sharpener.
customer_reviews.author: Rita C

customer_reviews.title: One, two and... three!
customer_reviews.text: Ás a color pencil enthusiast, I had to try this sharpener. It was really great! Therefore, I ordered a second one to carry with me to my art group and leave the first one in my studio. Now I have to order another for a gift at Christmas. The third one arrived and it is very hard for me not to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Sawyer

customer_reviews.title: Electric sharpeners work much better than manual sharpeners in my opinion
customer_reviews.text: Electric sharpeners work much better than manual sharpeners in my opinion. This is a great, well priced electric sharpener. Because it's battery operated it's portable in theory, but it's a little bulky to put in a pencil box or anything (and loud for a school setting). But, it is compact enough that it doesn't take up too much room on my desk the way other electric sharpeners do.
customer_reviews.author: Aidan

customer_reviews.title: Great home sharpener
customer_reviews.text: Small but strong little sharpener. Gets pencils VERY sharp. Easy to transport but a little on the heavier side (because of batteries). It's not really HEAVY, Just too heavy for my sons backpack. But great to stay at home
customer_reviews.author: Chantal I

customer_reviews.title: Small but Mighty!
customer_reviews.text: So glad to have found this pencil sharpener! It actually works well! I use batteries with mine. Have had another brand for a few years that never really sharpened anything...this one sharpens our pencils fairly quickly and evenly.
customer_reviews.author: gma sharon

customer_reviews.title: Did I get a lemon??
customer_reviews.text: This sharpener does not work. You have to hold it down but then it stops! The rotation seems to be in the opposite direction of how its suppose to be to work...!!!! HELP!! This is 8 batteries later and its still the same problem. There is a fundamental flaw to this shipment and I dont think Im the only one....it doesn't sharpen!!!
customer_reviews.author: adaline

customer_reviews.title: Amazingly good!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to sharpen colored pencils, which have a bad habit of breaking and clogging electric sharpeners. This thing takes batteries, which I thought I would be changing all the time, but I'm not, and so far the sharpener quickly gets colored pencils to a sharp point. I am very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: AZtruthteller

customer_reviews.title: works well
customer_reviews.text: I didn't realize there was a difference in how electric pencil sharpeners work. This is the good kind, works much better than the other one with the spinning single blade.
customer_reviews.author: practicalmom

customer_reviews.title: She loves it.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grand daughter. She just started school and is forever sharpening her pencils. She loves it and now wears her pencils down. She uses it on all pencils, colored or regular. Thanks. It was a holiday gift.
customer_reviews.author: Linny T

customer_reviews.title: Solid little sharpener
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving this battery powered sharpener 5 stars even though we broke it. We've had ours for a while. My daughter, pre-teen artist, who is already tough on most things, has had this with her for years. She finally dropped it accidentally in a tile floor. Of course it struck on the very corner of the plastic cover and broke (see images). This have me a moment to inspect the broken piece. This is some heavy, tough plastic. I hate to let her have mine--I bought 2 originally-- but unless I find a replacement cover guess I'll have to share.
customer_reviews.author: MadPanda

customer_reviews.title: I chose this pencil sharpener for several reasons: strong ...
customer_reviews.text: I chose this pencil sharpener for several reasons: strong motor, battery operated, and we have one in my office. Being able to use it in a busy executive office convinced me this was the pencil sharpener I needed! Arrived on time and as described.
customer_reviews.author: Ez B

customer_reviews.title: Constantly not sharpening
customer_reviews.text: When it works, it's great. It suddenly will not sharpen. My husband took it apart and we saw nothing lodged in it. Is there a fix or can it be serviced?
customer_reviews.author: LL

customer_reviews.title: Liked it so much I purchased a second one!
customer_reviews.text: Good choice for colored pencils, such as prima color, and for 'painting' in colored pencils. I have not had, nor used, this sharpener for a time to establish reliability numbers. The sharpener doesn't ... gobble... up the pencil. The grindings are fine and the cover is tight to the sharpener but relatively easy to remove (one you get the hang of it). It gives a good sharp point - critical for paining in colored pencils. I liked so much I purchased a second unit for seminars.
customer_reviews.author: apatterson

customer_reviews.title: Okay product
customer_reviews.text: It works but... it bogs down as you try to sharpen the pencil since it’s just a battery type. It also doesn’t have any rubber or suction cups on the bottom, so you need both hands cause it spins / moves. Otherwise it works and it looks sleek.
customer_reviews.author: Maile Hemm

customer_reviews.title: does not work well
customer_reviews.text: It's waste of money, i might as well get a small manual sharpener, it doesnt sharpen well and too loud.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy this sharpener. You won't regret it!
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice little sharpener. It sharpens very quickly and puts a good, sharp point on your pencil. I especially like the size and weight - it fits easily in a backpack. It is very simple to clean - just pop off the shavings container and empty. Furthermore, I have used it daily for about 3 months now, and have not had to change the batteries. All-in-all, this is by far the best electric pencil sharpener I have ever used. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Charles Koch

customer_reviews.title: Good little sharpener
customer_reviews.text: I gave a review on this item a couple days ago but it seems to have evaporated. Anyway, I'm very happy with this sharpener. It doesn't take up much room and gives a good point to my colored pencils. Even though it's got a little heft to it it's small enough, though, that you need to hold it still with one hand and sharpen with the other. Not a problem for me but might be for some people. It was shipped promptly.
customer_reviews.author: Lorelei_1

customer_reviews.title: The perfect pencil sharpener.
customer_reviews.text: This is a pencil sharpener worth owning. The internals are just like the pencil sharpener of old, the ones hanging in the schools with geared metal, not some cheap razor blade spinning on a cheap motor. The delivery from Tripworthy was excellent. The product was well packaged and their followup email was frwatly apprwciated. Will definitely be buying there again.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: What a great pencil sharpener
customer_reviews.text: What a great pencil sharpener. I'm a teacher and I bought this for my classroom at the beginning of the school year. It's still going strong, which is saying something, given it's been in a 7th grade classroom for almost 8 months! 😂
customer_reviews.author: Jeana

product_meta.title: Electric Pencil Sharpener - Battery Operated (No Cord) - Ideal for No. 2 and Colored Pencils (Drawing, Coloring) - Small and Durable - Kid Friendly - Artist, Students, and Professionals
product_meta.description:
Do you need an electric pencil sharpener that can go anywhere and handle any sharpening task? It's time to consider our compact, easy-to-use electric pencil sharpener. It sharpens both colored and no. 2 pencils with ease.

Lightweight and small, this automatic pencil sharpener is a great choice for the aspiring artist, driven student or working professional. It's battery powered (*batteries not included), which means you don't have to worry about finding a place to plug it in. Paired with its durability and use for various pencils, that makes it the perfect choice for art classes that take place anywhere!

Performance is always a top priority, which is why this electric pencil sharpener boasts an auto-stop feature that protects hands and pencil points. For safety (kid friendly), the sharpener won't operate if any part of its outer assembly is missing. For convenience, the sharpener automatically stops operating once a pencil is perfectly sharpened. 

 * Automatically sharpens any #2 & color pencils
 * Creates a sharp yet durable point in seconds
 * Battery operated electric motor
 * Compact, lightweight, fast and convenient
 * Clean shavings with no mess
 * Eliminates wasted time 
 * Extends pencil life
 * Kid and Adult Friendly
feature_bullets: 2020 DESIGN WITH AMAZING QUALITY AND PERFORMANCE FROM A COMPACT PENCIL SHARPENER: Built with the needs of artist, teachers, students and business people in mind, this electric pencil sharpener boasts the best in performance and durability. Crafted from high-quality materials, it does the job right every time.

BATTERY POWERED: Manual pencil sharpeners can't touch the results offered by this battery-powered wonder. Every pencil is sharpened to a perfect point to ensure ease in drawing, coloring, writing and more. This electronic operated pencil sharpener is great for artist of all ages, both professionals and students. (*Batteries not included)

ADULT & KID FRIENDLY: Our innovative, auto-stop safety feature prevents this pencil sharpener from being used if any part of the assembly is missing. That means no hurt fingers, which makes it an ideal choice for classrooms with young kids .

IDEAL FOR ANY SETTING: This versatile pencil sharpener handles colored and soft lead pencils with ease. Looking for a colored pencil sharpener? This is it! Looking for a solid standby to sharpen No. 2 pencils? It does that too!
MANUFACTURER GUARANTEE: TripWorthy stands by all of our products and each are backed by a Manufacturer Warranty. If you're not satisfied, we're here to make things right.
